text.text: How do I preview a facility invoice on the Facilities page?

text: To preview a facility invoice, you can click the "With outstanding balances" tab and then click the facility name. You can also click the "Queued claims" tab to see a list of claims that have yet to be invoiced.

text.text: What is the purpose of previewing a facility invoice before generating it?

text: Previewing a facility invoice is a good way to ensure its accuracy and obtain an understanding of the final invoice's appearance. When you click the "Preview invoice" button, a PDF will display with a clear "Preview" label to differentiate it from the official invoice. Once you have reviewed the preview invoice, make corrections if necessary. When you are satisfied with the accuracy, click the "Generate invoice" button to create the final version.

text.text: Can I make corrections to a previewed facility invoice? If so, how?

text: Yes, you can make corrections to a previewed facility invoice. Once you have reviewed the preview invoice, make corrections if necessary. When you are satisfied with the accuracy, click the "Generate invoice" button to create the final version.

text.text: What steps should I follow to generate a facility invoice?

text: To generate a facility invoice, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the With outstanding balance tab 3. Click the name of the facility 4. Click the Queued claims tab 5. Preview the invoice and then Generate it.

text.text: Is it possible to change the invoice due date before generating a facility invoice?

text: Yes, you can change the invoice due date before generating a facility invoice.

text.text: What options do I have for formatting facility invoices?

text: There are several ways to format a facility invoice. You can use the preview function to determine which format you want to use. If you know which format you want, you can click the format's radio button. You can also display your company logo on a facility invoice.

text.text: How can I combine outstanding charges into a single invoice for a facility?

text: To combine outstanding charges into a single invoice for a facility, you can click the With outstanding balances tab. This list shows the facility information, any new charges, and the outstanding balance. The outstanding balance is the total amount of charges invoiced to this facility minus discounts (contractual allowances).

text.text: What is the difference between the "With new charges" and "With outstanding balances" tabs on the Facilities page?

text: The "With new charges" tab shows the facility information, any new charges, and the outstanding balance. The "With outstanding balances" tab shows the facility information, any new charges, and the outstanding balance. The outstanding balance is the total amount of charges invoiced to this facility minus discounts (contractual allowances).

text.text: How can I remove a claim from a facility invoice after it has been generated?

text: To remove a claim from a facility invoice, you can click the "Remove from facility invoice" button. The system will ask if you are sure you want to delete the claim from the facility invoice. If you click Yes then the claim's status will change to "Suspended – Verify COB".

text.text: When would a claim be automatically removed from a facility invoice?

text: A claim would be automatically removed from a facility invoice if you change the charges when a facility is the payer. The system removes the claim from the facility.

text.text: What happens to contractual allowances when a claim is removed from a facility invoice?

text: When a claim is removed from a facility invoice, the contractual allowances applied to the claim are reversed. This means that the claim's balance is increased by the CA amounts.

text.text: What should I do if I incorrectly charged a facility for a claim?

text: If you incorrectly charged a facility for a claim, you can fix the incorrect charge and then send the facility a new statement. You can also remove the claim from the facility invoice by clicking the "Remove from facility invoice" button. The system will ask if you are sure you want to delete the claim from the facility invoice. If you click Yes then the claim's status will change to "Suspended – Verify COB".

text.text: How do I update charges on a submitted claim for a facility invoice?

text:
To update charges on a submitted claim for a facility invoice, you can follow these steps:

1. Go to the Claim page for the submitted claim.
2. Click the Charges tab and then click the edit icon.
3. Update the charge(s) on the Claim page.
4. Click Save changes.
5. Click Resubmit to payer.

text.text: After updating charges on a claim, what steps should I take to generate a new invoice?

text:
After updating charges on a claim, you can generate a new invoice by following these steps:

1. Click the edit icon next to the ' Invoice period ' field and select the correct date.
2. Click Generate invoice.
3. A new invoice will display with the updated charge information.

text.text: Can I view a list of past facility invoices generated for a specific facility?

text: Yes, you can view a list of past facility invoices generated for a specific facility by clicking the "Past invoices" tab on the Facilities page. You can also view a list of facilities with new charges by clicking the "With new charges" tab.

text.text: How can I export a facility invoice in a printable format?

text: You can export a facility invoice in a printable format by following these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities. 2. Click Export all facilities. 3. Click the Download button.

text.text: What options do I have for invoice formats when generating a facility invoice?

text:
When generating a facility invoice, you can choose from the following invoice format types:

* Single invoice with all claims (together)
* Single invoice with all claims (together, including past invoiced claims)
* Single invoice with all claims (separated)
* Separate invoices, one per claim
* 1500 per claim

text.text: Is it possible to print or download a previewed facility invoice?

text: Yes, you can print or download a previewed facility invoice.

text.text: What information is included in a facility invoice's PDF preview?

text: When you click the "Preview invoice" button, a PDF will display with a clear "Preview" label to differentiate it from the official invoice.

text.text: How can I identify claims that have yet to be invoiced for a facility?

text: To identify claims that have yet to be invoiced for a facility, you can click the Queued claims tab. This will display a list of claims that have yet to be invoiced.

text.text: How To preview an facility invoice?

text: To preview an facility invoice, you can follow these steps: 1. Click the name of the facility 2. Click the Queued claims tab 3. Click the Preview invoice button 4. Check the invoice due date 5. Click the radio button next to the desired format 6. Click Generate.

text.text: How can I Generating a facility invoice?

text: To generate a facility invoice, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the With outstanding balance tab 3. Click the name of the facility 4. Click the Queued claims tab 5. Click the Preview invoice button 6. Check the invoice due date 7. Click the radio button next to the desired format 8. Click Generate.

text.text: Give me some invoice format types

text: There are several invoice format types from which you can choose: Only display amount(s) due on invoices/1500s, Single invoice with all claims (together), Single invoice with all claims (together, including past invoiced claims).

text.text: Explain invoicing outstanding balances

text: Instead of generating a single invoice for every outstanding facility charge, you can combine all outstanding amounts into one invoice. To begin, click the With outstanding balances tab. This list shows the facility information, any new charges, and the outstanding balance. The outstanding balance is the total amount of charges invoiced to this facility minus discounts (contractual allowances).
For more information click this: https://help.zollonline.com/billing/Content/Videos.htm?wchannelid=m8t21u1viq&wmediaid=2wu3qwpf0s

text.text: How to fix an incorrect facility charge?

text: To fix an incorrect facility charge, you can update the charge on the claim page and resubmit to the payer. You can also generate a new invoice with the updated charge information.
For more information click this: https://help.zollonline.com/billing/Content/Videos.htm?wchannelid=m8t21u1viq&wmediaid=hlsxcylp49

text.text: How to Remove a claim from a facility invoice?

text: To remove a claim from a facility invoice, you can click the "Remove from facility invoice" button. The system will ask if you are sure you want to delete the claim from the facility invoice. If you click Yes then the claim's status will change to "Suspended – Verify COB".

text.text: What to do if you incorrectly charged a facility?

text: If you incorrectly charged a facility, you can fix the incorrect charge and then send the facility a new statement.
